readable.title: 495014499_8fd065cfd9
readable.content: A man holding a flag is standing on a busy sidewalk . A man in a ball cap stands in a crosswalk with a flag in a crowded city . A man stands on a crosswalk holding a flag . Man standing on a street with a green red and yellow flag wrapped around him and a cap on his head . Man wrapped in flag stands in city intersection , lit billboards in background .
